Liga
ASSE: Oscar Garcia to a Spanish bench
Passed by the bench of the ASSE during a few months, Oscar Garcia would be about to find a club on the side of Spain with Celta Vigo.
04 Nov 2019, 14:40 by Antoine Chirat



Harold MoukoudiClub previous: Le HavreTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Jean-Eudes Aholou Previous club: AS MonacoTransfer fee: none (ready) Icon Sport



Alpha SissokoClub previous: ClermontTransfer allowance: noneIcon Sport



Yohan CabayeClub previous: without clubTransfer fee: noneIcon Sport



Sergi PalenciaClub previous: FC BarcelonaTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Miguel TraucoClub previous: FlamengoTransfer allowance: 1 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Denis BouangaClub previous: N√Æmes OlympiqueTransfer fee: ‚Ç¨ 4.5 M Icon Sport



Ryad BoudebouzClub previous: Betis SevillaTransfer allowance: 3.5 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport



Zaydou Youssouf Previous club: Girondins de BordeauxTransfer allowance: 2 M ‚Ç¨ Icon Sport

ASSE: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




Just at the mention of his name, Etienne supporters still have chills in the back. Oscar Garcia is one of the biggest defeats of the Greens at home against OL with a heavy 5-0 defeat on November 5, 2017. Following the meeting, the Spanish technician handed his resignation to his leaders after only 12 days of championship.




Olympiakos, then Celta Vigo?




Oscar Garcia on the green bench + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Since then, the Spaniard has suffered a new failure on the side of Greece and Olympiakos where he has once again held 13 meetings in all and for all. Without a club since April 2018, he is about to rebound in Spain Celta Vigo, poorly in Liga, according to information from Mundo Deportivo,. Indeed, Celta players are struggling and point to 18th place with 9 points on the clock. Time is up for change and Oscar Garcia could take the opportunity to find a bench.
